const RequestPacket *  p,
int  nbrPacks = 1
) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
subType The subtype of the reply (same as that of the request).
p The (search)requestpacket that this reply is a reply to.
nbrPacks The number of other packets to merge into this packet. (SearchHandler should not merge stuff into packets...).
